name: PIE (PHP Installer for Extensions)
description: Installs PIE and optional PHP extensions.

version.description: PIE version to install. Use latest or a release tag.

verifyAttestation.description: Verify PIE release attestation with gh CLI before install.

installPrereqs.description: Install build prerequisites for PIE extension compilation.

extensions.description: Extensions to install. Supports PIE package names (e.g. phpredis/phpredis) and bundled names: pcntl, sockets.
